backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining user profiles, tasks, audit logs, avatars, task history, and comparison helpers, integrating storage and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining legacy and new actor state shapes and a no-op run function that returns the old state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing features, involved frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten short summaries for multiple frontend source files describing their roles and behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root React app and including a rebuild timestamp comment.
frontend/public/rebuild-trigger.txt: Text file containing a timestamp and build version used to trigger rebuilds.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling auth bootstrap, error recovery, profile routing, and timeout safeguards.
frontend/src/components/AccountResetDial: Provides a confirmation dialog to flush a user's account, clear session state, reset caches, and sign out.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that shows a fallback UI and allows the user to reload the page after an unhandled error.
frontend/src/components/AuthBootstrapErr: Displays an error screen for profile‑load failures with retry, sign‑out, and optional reset actions.
frontend/src/components/FullSystemResetD: Provides an admin‑only dialog to wipe all system data, clear session state, and sign the user out.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication provider and hook for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, registration, and other backend interactions using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Custom React hook managing light, dark, and system themes with persistence and auto-resolving system changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining extensive light and dark mode design tokens for the app’s color system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AssistantDashboard.ts: Assistant dashboard showing greeting, task overview, overtime section, and logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page handling role selection, manager token input, error states, and Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerDashboard.tsx: Manager dashboard displaying team management, analytics, settings cards, and logout behavior.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Profile setup form for assistants or managers, validating input and submitting registration mutations.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleDashboard.tsx: React dashboard page showing user profile details, role badge, and logout handling using Internet Identity and React Query.
frontend/src/utils/managerTokenGate.ts: Manages manager token and gate message storage in sessionStorage, including set, get, clear, and combined reset operations.
frontend/src/utils/sessionStateReset.ts: Clears all sessionStorage keys related to role selection and manager token gating.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Maps backend and auth-related errors to user-friendly English error messages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, animations, shadows, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: JSON file describing project state, issues, and feature requests related to full backend reset and login flow fixes.
